name: Smurfix
description:
The game was made as a part of Game Development course at XAMK Finland University of Applied Sciences Description

Even tho Papa Smurf (all matches with existed characters are random) is old, he still has gunpowder in the flask. Help Papa Smurf collect all kisses and then hit the Big Mushroom to win the game. Let's make Papa Smurf great again in Smurfix!

Papa Smurf is not a serious game created when getting acquainted with the Construct 3  engine.

Controllers

Hold LMB to drag and drop Papa Smurf (the gravity will do the rest of the job)

<- to use superpowers ->

Developers Game Design: Vesna Grau
UI: Vesna Grau
Art: Vesna Grau
Code: Vesna Grau
